channel.title: ~@@@Serials-Scape High Detail [508] Release!@@@~
channel.description:
Hy guys!! Remember when I say "I will start coding and release a base!!"? Well this is it my source :D
Server Download Link: http://ifile.it/s8bz6fa Cache Download Link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WIM2S072 Client Download Link: http://uppit.com/7SKORQ
INSTALL CACHE ON C:\WINDOWS!!!
Some Features:
-Full castle wars!! -Shopping working!! -Full bounty hunter!! -Full NPC's in varrock!! -Summoning Base!! (Sumonning NPC's can't only attack!!) -Pickpocketing (Thieving Fully Working) -Full modern spells working!! (Except the ones that needs some staff!!) -Pk, of course!! -Shortbows and Crystal bow works!! (Dark Bow and LongBows doesn't work!! Sonn will be fixed!!) [b]-High Detail Source!![/b]
[b]AND MUCH MORE!![/b]
Some Images:
[img]http://i427.photobucket.com/albums/pp352/bruno955/serials-scape1.png[/img] [img]http://i427.photobucket.com/albums/pp352/bruno955/serials-scape2.png[/img] [img]http://i427.photobucket.com/albums/pp352/bruno955/serials-scape3.png[/img] [img]http://i427.photobucket.com/albums/pp352/bruno955/serials-scape4.png[/img]
Hope You Like It :D
